attributes.action: I would like to make a stop to lgbt bullying and hate crime
attributes.background: I would like action on this because I feel not enough is going on to stop this in society and it happens to much and nothing is done to help this and stop this

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like more help to reduce bullying and hate crime, but are not sure what help you would like.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to introduce specific measures to combat bullying, if that's what you'd like to see happen.

You might also like to sign these petitions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232431
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223858
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230119
